code:
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic w,
    input logic R,
    input logic E,
    input logic L,
    output logic Q
);

    // Initial block for simulation purposes
    initial begin
        Q = 1'b0;
    end

    // Sequential logic block
    always_ff @(posedge clk) begin
        if (L) begin
            Q <= R; // Load operation
        end else if (E) begin
            Q <= w; // Shift operation
        end
        // If neither L nor E is asserted, Q retains its value
    end

endmodule
